GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.17.13
GSD.description:
KVM: x86: avoid calling x86 emulator without a decoded instruction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.13 by commit dca5ea67a3e627a3022fe58722a2807c1ef61c29, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 4aa2691dcbd38ce1c461188799d863398dd2865d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: KVM: x86: avoid calling x86 emulator without a decoded instruction
